places_with_reviews.name: Wyte Portico Hotel
address: High School Jn, Karuvatta Pathanamthitta, Adoor, Kerala 691523, India

reviews.text:
Went to Bali
Good ambience, family friendly.
It wasn’t crowded when we went.
5 stars for the arrangements and ambience. 2 stars for delayed service. Orders for starters taken were forgotten and never given. Takes on an average 1 hour to serve food after placing order. Prices on higher side.

This place  offers a culinary experience that exceeds expectations. With a charming ambiance and attentive service, dining here is a delight. The menu showcases a fusion of flavors, from traditional favorites to innovative creations, all prepared with the finest ingredients. Whether you're indulging in their signature dishes or exploring their seasonal specials, each bite is a culinary revelation. Don't miss the opportunity to dine at White Portico – it's a culinary journey you won't soon forget.

I reserved lunch for a group of 33 officers from Govt of Haryana, and it was truly exceptional. From the warm welcome to the impeccable service, every aspect of the experience was outstanding. The venue's elegant ambiance and delicious, expertly prepared dishes made for a memorable dining experience. The staff's professionalism and genuine hospitality added to the overall enjoyment. I highly recommend this establishment for anyone seeking a top-notch dining experience.

Went for lunch buffet twice. It costs 399 + tax. Nice buffet except non vegetarian items. Avoid their Fish curry and Chicken roast / curry. But their vegetarian dishes are amazing. Another drawback is limited wash / toilet facility for the restaurant. But they are doing their best to keep it clean.

"This hotel offers a pleasant stay with a nice restaurant and bar, along with all basic amenities. However, the gym is currently not operational, and the restaurant prices are on the higher side. The staff is helpful, and the rooms are kept neat and clean. Conveniently located near DTDC High School Junction, it's easily accessible via public bus transportation."

places_with_reviews.name: Park Residency
address: Adoor Pathanapuran Road Parakode, Adoor, Kerala 691554, India

reviews.text: Had a great stay here for my business trip! The rooms are clean and comfortable, and the bathroom and restaurant facilities are excellent. They even surprised me with a complimentary breakfast, even though I didn't book it. Overall, a very positive experience with friendly and helpful staff.

Very nice hotel to stay. For the price you pay the quality of the building, premises, rooms and the food you get is great. Very accessible location. The rooms were well kept, cleaned and with all modern amenities including an ironing board and iron and fridge. The food that was available through room service was great and reasonably priced. There is a mayabay lounge on the rooftop. The normal bar on the ground floor does not affect the quality of a family visit. Plenty of parking, though open. Great experience.
Better than I expected. High-standard hotel with a great staff. I want to give a special thanks to Priya Matthew and the management team.

The hotel is amazing, but the best service I received was from the Receptionist. The receptionist was extremely polite and was super helpful who took an extra mile to help me out with my stay and travel. Thank you very much for all your help!

The worst food I ever had, I have ordered chicken biriyani, the chicken was not at all boiled correctly and the rice was having some bad odour while having it. We ordered 5 chicken biriyani and none of them were good even after paying 200₹ each. Very disappointed because of the food!!

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Yamuna
address: Yamuna Complex, Kayamkulam - Punalur Rd, near Old Private Bus Stand, Parass La, Adoor, Kerala 691523, India

reviews.text:
Restaurant Hot and Sour!
If you have ever visit Adoor anytime Don't  missed out to drop in to this Restaurant for your Break fast. They Continental Break Fast, North Indian and as you know it's Kerela they have Kerela special Items. You have pleasant and fastest service. Food are delicious the staff are polite. What else one need! I recommended to all try it you won't regret

The staff was very friendly and helpful.

The room had a cigarette smell, and the towels provided were small.

The room had all the necessary amenities for a 3-star hotel room.

Good rooms and service. Parking is around the roadside. Can park around 6,7 cars. You can also park behind the hotel inside the gate. Rooms are pretty neat and well maintained. The only negative side is that there is always a liquor smell around the  hotel. Parking behind the hotel is also very difficult as it is always crowded with people from the bar.
Calm and quiet restaurant to enjoy your food with your loved ones. Mr. Ajay is very passionate about the work he do. He makes the dining experience enjoyable.

The restaurant's food serving was impressive, with well-portioned dishes that satisfied both the eyes and the palate. The presentation added to the overall dining experience, making it a delightful culinary journey.

places_with_reviews.name: Indraprastha
address: Kayamkulam - Pathanapuram Rd, Vinobaji Sreemoolam Nagar Residents Association, Parass La, Adoor, Kerala 691523, India

reviews.text: Usually order's from indraprastha if there is any family function in our family. The quality of food is great. And the staff service is also nice. One of the best restaurants in Adoor town.
I went there to have lunch. Food was good but the serving time was too long. I had to wait for more than one hour after getting the seat.

Worst experience very rude behavior of cabin waiter special bald headed guy
Even ac is not working here waste of money

Very bad experience in my life ever. Not recomended for family. Only for proffesional drinkers🥲.... specially HR manager Mr. Santhosh's attitude is very rude and showing no manners to ladies also. Unsatisafied.
Dear management,
Please avoid these kind of people otherwise it will affect the goodwill of your whole management.
Thank you.

Food is good. Everything else is just horrible. They just try to rob you. During check in, they promise all kind of things and then will give a different story during check out. Even if you in a hurry during check out, check the bills properly. There will be atleast 1000rs. Extra somewhere. Half of the kitchen bills will be signed and half won't be. Will tell the whole price at first and when you ask only, they will deduct the advance we paid. I had a nightmare at this place.

reviews.text: Very good hotel in adoor city, only price is higher than other hotels, but facilities are good

Lal's Residence is a tranquil haven of luxury. The rooms are beautifully appointed, combining comfort and style effortlessly. The food service is exceptional, with a delightful array of delectable dishes. The attentive staff provided top-notch service, making my stay truly memorable. For a serene and unforgettable experience

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Central Park
address: Kayamkulam - Pathanapuram Rd, Adoor, Kerala 691523, India

reviews.text: Good stay, and the bar food is just awesome.

The hotel was below average and the over all experience was very disappointing. We were a two pax booking but the towel provided was just one. We enquired at the reception and he said that's the hotel policy. The complimentary water for second day was provided only after a huge fight and third day they dint even bother to check. Housekeeping was very poor and in our 3 day stay, not even once they cleaned the room. I personally wouldn't recommend this for a family rather you can stay in a lodge in a much cheaper rate and better service.

I came to know that it has BAR too after reaching there, filled with locals.
I was tired enough to go and search for another and thus ended up here.
The corridor to the room is attached to the bar entry where we'll get the vomiting smell. The rooms and toilets had a smell of fungus, like wet gypsum work.
The service was very good and updated.

The best thing about the hotel is the staff at the reception. He was very polite and friendly. Everything else is mediocre. Bathrooms aren't clean enough and aren't maintained properly. Food from the restaurant wasn't particularly great. All in all it's an average hotel and is not really worth the money you see in makemytrip etc
Hectic day experience of staying in this hotel. The hotel manager was so rude and charged me 6600 Indian rupee for one and half days. I really suggest not to choose this hotel for your next stay....
